```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("rstatix")
library("pander")
```

```{r}
Telerobot_ages %>%
  drop_na("Q_TELEROBOT_WOULD_U_1") %>%
  anova_test(Q_TELEROBOT_WOULD_U_1 ~ Q_AGE_GROUP * Q_ROBOT_NARS)

```
```{r}
Telerobot_ages %>%
  drop_na("Q_TELEROBOT_WOULD_U_1") %>%
  aov(Q_TELEROBOT_WOULD_U_1 ~ v + Q_AGE_GROUP, data = .) %>%
  Anova(type="III")
```
